reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan soft, comfortable, and warm, with nice colors and good quality. They like the style, with one customer particularly appreciating the fair isle pattern. The fit receives mixed feedback - while some say it's true to size, others mention the sleeves are too long.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Peruvian sweater
items.body: I am very happy with this sweater. In the photo it looks like it's light blue but it's actually a light grey. The colors and design are very pretty. I am 5'1" and 105 pounds and it fits very nicely. It's actually a little long so it would be perfect for someone taller, but I am happy with the fit. It's roomy enough to wear a thin shirt underneath and it seems like a good quality warm sweater. Just be sure to look at the washing instructions on the label as alpaca wool needs to be hand washed. Read more
items.author: Carter

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful colors
items.body: This sweater is beautiful and soft. I always get compliments on it. Read more
items.author: Gail Seidler

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute but thin
items.body: I would give it 5 stars, but oh my goodness when they say light they mean it. Very soft, more like spring wear in a cool day. The photo looked blue but it’s a soft grey. I ordered the multicolored. Fits well over a tight white cuddledud. I’m 5’4 115. Read more
items.author: Nice and warm. Slightly long in the tips.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Itchy
items.body: Nice but Alpaca vest is a little bit itchy Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Fit
items.body: Great size fit perfect Thick too very well made my loves this sweater Read more
items.author: George Russell Leard

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stretchy knit, covers a couple of sizes.
items.body: Looks small, but it is very stretchy so it covers a range of sizes. Read more
items.author: Judith Judy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gamboa Genuine Alpaca Cardigan Sweater for Women
items.body: Superior Quality and Workmanship! Read more
items.author: JN

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Multicolored. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
